messages.title: Your Scottish Conservative and Unionist Candidate for Glenrothes
messages.content: Nicola Sturgeon wants to force another independence referendum as early as 2021. To stop her, vote Scottish Conservative and Unionist.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strengthen our local economy in Glenrothes.
Stand up for our public services, our NHS in Fife and our schools.
Focus on improving apprenticeships and job opportunities for young people to get high-quality employment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour and the Lib Dems are too weak to beat the SNP here.

issues.economy: Strengthen our local economy in Glenrothes.
issues.health: Stand up for ... our NHS in Fife ...
issues.labourEmployment: Focus on improving apprenticeships and job opportunities for young people to get high-quality employment.

contactInformation.address: Central Office, 46 Marylebone High Street, London, W1U 5HQ. Printed by Solopress, 9 Stock Road, Southend-on-Sea, Essex, SS2 5QF.
